00027 #include <QFile>
00028 #include "xmlparser.h"
00029 
00030 #define DBG 0
00031 #define STD(a) (a).toAscii().data()
00032 #define STDR(a) STD((a).toString())
00033 
00034 XmlParser::XmlParser()
00035         : mHandlers(11, &XmlParser::handleNoToken)
00036 {
00037         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::Invalid) = &XmlParser::handleInvalid;
00038         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::StartDocument) = &XmlParser::handleStartDocument;
00039         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::EndDocument) = &XmlParser::handleEndDocument;
00040         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::StartElement) = &XmlParser::handleStartElement;
00041         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::EndElement) = &XmlParser::handleEndElement;
00042         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::Characters) = &XmlParser::handleCharacters;
00043         mHandlers.at(QXmlStreamReader::DTD) = &XmlParser::handleDTD;
00044 }
00045 
00046 XmlParser::~XmlParser()
00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 void XmlParser::handleNoToken(void)
00051 {
00052         if (DBG) std::cerr << "NoToken" << std::endl;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void XmlParser::handleInvalid(void)
00056 {
00057         if (DBG) std::cerr << "Invalid" << std::endl;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void XmlParser::handleStartDocument(void)
00061 {
00062         if (DBG) std::cerr << "StartDocument" << std::endl;
00063         if (mXml.documentEncoding() != "utf-8")
00064                 mXml.raiseError("Document encoding is not UTF-8!");
00065 }
00066 
00067 void XmlParser::handleEndDocument(void)
00068 {
00069         if (DBG) std::cerr << "EndDocument" << std::endl;
00070 }
00071 
00072 #define ATTR(xml, name, type) (xml).attributes().value( #name ).toString().to ##type ()
00073 
00074 void XmlParser::handleStartElement(void)
00075 {
00076         if (DBG) std::cerr << "StartElement";
00077         if (DBG) std::cerr << ", name: '" << STDR(mXml.name()) << "'" << std::endl;
00078         switch (mCurSection) {
00079                 case IGNORED_SECTION:
00080                         if (mXml.name() == "chemical_element") 
00081                         {
00082                                 mCurSection = ELEMENT_CONFIG_SECTION;
00083                                 mElement = new Element();
00084                                 if (!mElement.isNull())
00085                                         mElement->setProperty(
00086                                                 Element::SYMBOL_PROPERTY,
00087                                                 ATTR(mXml, symbol, StdString)
00088                                         );
00089                         }
00090                         break;
00091                 case ELEMENT_CONFIG_SECTION:
00092                         if (mElement.isNull()) break;
00093                         if (mXml.name() == "name") {
00094                                 mElement->setProperty(
00095                                         Element::NAME_PROPERTY,
00096                                         ATTR(mXml, val, StdString)
00097                                 );
00098                         } else if (mXml.name() == "abundance") {
00099                                 mElement->setProperty(
00100                                         Element::ABUNDANCE_PROPERTY,
00101                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Double)
00102                                 );
00103                         } else if (mXml.name() == "atomic_weight") {
00104                                 mElement->setProperty(
00105                                         Element::ATOMIC_MASS_PROPERTY,
00106                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Double)
00107                                 );
00108                         } else if (mXml.name() == "nucleons") {
00109                                 mElement->setProperty(
00110                                         Element::NUCLEONS_PROPERTY,
00111                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Int)
00112                                 );
00113                         } else if (mXml.name() == "electrons") {
00114                                 mElement->setProperty(
00115                                         Element::ELECTRONS_PROPERTY,
00116                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Int)
00117                                 );
00118                         } else if (mXml.name() == "neutron_scattering_length") {
00119                                 mCurSection = NS_L_SECTION;
00120                         } else if (mXml.name() == "neutron_scattering_cross_section") {
00121                                 mCurSection = NS_C_SECTION;
00122                         } else if (mXml.name() == "xray_scattering_anomalous_coefficients") {
00123                                 mCurSection = XRAY_COEFFICIENTS_SECTION;
00124                         }
00125                         break;
00126                 case NS_L_SECTION:
00127                         if (mElement.isNull()) break;
00128                         if (mXml.name() == "coherent") 
00129                         {
00130                                 mElement->setProperty(
00131                                         Element::NS_L_COHERENT_PROPERTY, 
00132                                         complex(
00133                                                 ATTR(mXml, re, Double),
00134                                                 ATTR(mXml, im, Double)
00135                                 ));
00136                         } else if (mXml.name() == "incoherent") 
00137                         {
00138                                 mElement->setProperty(
00139                                         Element::NS_L_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY, 
00140                                         complex(
00141                                                 ATTR(mXml, re, Double), 
00142                                                 ATTR(mXml, im, Double)
00143                                 ));
00144                         }
00145                         break;
00146                 case NS_C_SECTION:
00147                         if (mElement.isNull()) break;
00148                         if (mXml.name() == "coherent") {
00149                                 mElement->setProperty(
00150                                         Element::NS_CS_COHERENT_PROPERTY,
00151                                         ATTR(mXml, re, Double)); 
00152                         } else if (mXml.name() == "incoherent") {
00153                                 mElement->setProperty(
00154                                         Element::NS_CS_INCOHERENT_PROPERTY,
00155                                         ATTR(mXml, re, Double));
00156                         } else if (mXml.name() == "total") {
00157                                 mElement->setProperty(
00158                                         Element::NS_CS_TOTAL_PROPERTY,
00159                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Double) );
00160                         } else if (mXml.name() == "absorption") {
00161                                 mElement->setProperty(
00162                                         Element::NS_CS_ABSORPTION_PROPERTY,
00163                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Double) );
00164                         }
00165                         break;
00166                 case XRAY_COEFFICIENTS_SECTION:
00167                         if (mElement.isNull()) break;
00168                         if (mXml.name() == "ev") {
00169                                 mElement->addXrayCoefficient(
00170                                         ATTR(mXml, val, Double),
00171                                         ATTR(mXml, fp, Double),
00172                                         ATTR(mXml, fpp, Double) );
00173                         }
00174                         break;
00175                 default:
00176                         break;
00177         }
00178 }
00179 
00180 void XmlParser::handleEndElement(void)
00181 {
00182         if (DBG) std::cerr << "EndElement";
00183         if (DBG) std::cerr << ", name: '" << STDR(mXml.name()) << "'" << std::endl;
00184         if (mXml.name() == "chemical_element") {
00185                 mCurSection = IGNORED_SECTION;
00186                 if (!mElement->isValid()) {
00187                         mXml.raiseError("Element not valid!");
00188                 } else {
00189                         mResultList.push_back(mElement);
00190                         mElement = NULL; // forget about this element now
00191                 }
00192         } else
00193         if (mXml.name() == "chemical_element_list" && 
00194             mCurSection != IGNORED_SECTION)
00195         {
00196                 mXml.raiseError("Syntax error, element configuration not finished!");
00197         } else
00198         if (mXml.name() == "neutron_scattering_length" ||
00199             mXml.name() == "neutron_scattering_cross_section")
00200         {
00201                 mCurSection = ELEMENT_CONFIG_SECTION;
00202         }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void XmlParser::handleCharacters(void)
00206 {
00207         if (!mXml.isWhitespace()) {
00208                 mXml.raiseError("Unexpected Characters!");
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 void XmlParser::handleDTD(void)
00213 {
00214         if (mXml.dtdName() != "chemical_element_list")
00215         {
00216                 mXml.raiseError(QString("Unexpected DTD name '%1'").arg(
00217                         mXml.dtdName().toString()) + 
00218                         QString(" (expected 'chemical_element_list')!"));
00219         }
00220 }
00221 
00222 const XmlParser::ElementPtrList& XmlParser::read(const QString& filename)
00223 {
00224 #ifdef DEBUG
00225         if (!QFile::exists(filename)) 
00226                 std::cerr << "XmlParser::read, Internal Error, "
00227                         << "Supplied filename does not exist! (" 
00228                         << STD(filename) <<")"<< std::endl;
00229 #endif
00230 
00231         QFile xmlFile(filename);
00232         if ( !xmlFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly) ) {
00233                 mXml.raiseError("Could not open xml file !");
00234         }
00235         mXml.setDevice(&xmlFile);
00236 
00237         // parsedata init
00238         mCurSection = IGNORED_SECTION;
00239         mResultList.clear();
00240 
00241         while(!mXml.atEnd())
00242         {
00243                 QXmlStreamReader::TokenType tokenType = mXml.readNext();
00244                 (this->*mHandlers.at(tokenType))();
00245         }
00246         if (mCurSection != IGNORED_SECTION) {
00247                 mXml.raiseError("Invalid Element at end of file!");
00248         }
00249         if (mXml.error()) {
00250 #ifdef DEBUG
00251                 std::cerr << "XmlParser::read, Internal Error, ";
00252                 std::cerr << "A XML parse error occured: '";
00253                 std::cerr << STD(mXml.errorString()) << "'" << std::endl;
00254                 std::cerr << "file '"<< STD(xmlFile.fileName());
00255                 std::cerr << ", line: " << mXml.lineNumber()-1;
00256                 std::cerr << ", position: " << mXml.columnNumber();
00257                 std::cerr << std::endl;
00258 #endif
00259                 // delete dangling memory
00260                 delete mElement;
00261                 foreach(Element::Ptr ep, mResultList) {
00262                         if (!ep.isNull()) delete ep;
00263                 }
00264                 mResultList.clear();
00265         }
00266 
00267         mElement = NULL; // forget the last element created (should be NULL already)
00268         return mResultList;
00269 }
